name: CDM-gamelan-sample-library
tagline: Sample library of Casa da Música' Javanese Gamelan
body:
### Welcome to Casa da Música Gamelan Sample Library.
On this page you can download a sample library of the javanese gamelan of Casa da Música (Oporto, Portugal).

Within the downloaded files you can find Native Instruments Kontakt sampler files along with all recorded audio files. 

ENJOY :)

This library is released under the [Artistic License 2.0](https://github.com/Digitopia/CDM-GAMELAN-SAMPLE-LIBRARY/blob/master/LICENSE)



### Authors and Contributors
by Pedro Augusto (@augusto666)
 
maintained by Digitópia (https://github.com/digitopia)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
